name: Cargill - L22 Skin Lipid Mimetic
description: Cargill offers L22 Skin Lipid Mimetic, a biomimetic formulation designed to support natural barrier function and improve skin firmness and elasticity. This innovative lipid complex mimics the natural composition of skin surface lipids, providing comprehensive barrier support and anti-aging benefits.
notes: L22 designed to mimic the natural lipid profile of skin surface (sebum). Biomimetic approach ensures optimal skin compatibility and barrier support. Cargill is a major global ingredient supplier with extensive technical resources.
